about_the_game:
Breaching

Breaching is a cornerstone mechanic to Crunch Element. Place wall charges, throw grenades, and use peculiar weapons to blow holes in walls, ceilings, and floors to crack open entry points to compounds! Plan your entrance carefully! You never know what waits on the other side...


Destruction

Bullets shred through interior walls made of materials like wood and drywall! Use heavy explosives to blast through heavier materials like concrete. Make quick work of barricades with tools like the breaching hammer and impact grenades!


Tactics

Players can join up with allies at the Hideout and select a mission to begin. Once players arrive at the compound, they plan their attack, scout out the facility, and begin their raid. Players can play missions offline as a lone wolf and progress at their own pace.

Core Features

  • Rogue Mode - Start with a minimal kit, acquire weapons and attachments along the way, and survive as many rounds as possible with ever increasing difficulty!
  • Operations - A new flagship mode that strings together a series of hand-crafted levels. Salvage loot found in levels to buy more items, health, ammo, and explosives along the way!
  • Procedural Mode - Wreak havok and hone in your skills on procedurally generated compounds with constantly changing building layouts!
  • Sandbox - Get familiar with your arsenal and explore the mechanics of Crunch Element in the Sandbox, featuring a shooting range and killhouse!
  • 20 Unique Scenarios - Master your tactics on the 20 unique scenarios featured in the Operations mode. Mix up your approach, try new gear, and see how smoothly you can operate... New scenarios are constantly being added!
  • Build your Perfect Loadout - Modify guns to add optics, flashlights, grips, and muzzle devices to craft your perfect setup. Compliment your weapon choice with tactical gear such as wall charges, breaching hammers, grenade launchers, and more!
  • Up to 4 Player Co-op - Team up with your squad or take on the challenge as a lone wolf!
  • 4 Unique Objectives - Each mission has its own arrangement of objectives that must be completed before you can extract!
  • Destructible Environments - Blast, hit, and shoot your way into compounds to achieve the objectives. Whatever it takes!

Development Roadmap

Become a part of something great! Crunch Element is an early access game, meaning there is a constant flow of updates with a high reliance on player feedback. Below are some of the core priorities to look forward to as the game transitions through early access. Head on over to the and join the conversion!

Roadmap

  • Fixes and performance
  • Progression and unlocks
  • New items and attachments
  • And more!

name: Crunch Element

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale

short_description: Raid destructible compounds using explosive gadgets and tactical weaponry! Hone your CQB skills in constantly changing compound layouts and blast open entry points with explosives to get the perfect shot. Team up with your squad or take on the challenge as a lone wolf!
